title: 820-2879 reboot and black screen
message:
This board works ok but each 5-10 minutes reboot and blackscreen. Could be bad MCP?
Board has no liquid damage.

title: 820-2879 reboot and black screen
message: Check if the piece of tape is still on the airport connector that prevents the metal sponge from shorting out the pins. Could also be a bad RAM slot. If that does not solve it I call it trash.

title: 820-2879 reboot and black screen
message: Sorry but cannot understand you. Some picture you can share from internet what you mean?

title: 820-2879 reboot and black screen
message: Here the connector with tape and the sponge in cable..   Next to the red box...

title: 820-2879 reboot and black screen
message:
So, if I disconnect this cable should be enoght, right? 
Sorry, but I am not sure if I understand correctly.

title: 820-2879 reboot and black screen
message: Disconnect it and see if the problem goes away. If not it could be RAM issue too, are you using PC8500?
